oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fireworks on the river

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fireworks display on the river at Memphis. -- Text on front: $10,000.00 Display of Gordons Fire Works Co. of Chicago at Memphis Centennial May 22, 1919. -- No. 21 Poland
